ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, how many people out of the total subscribers play bards?  by the numbers posted here, less than 5%.  by your argument, then bards and their issues are
ygData.messageBody:
ok, how many people out of the total subscribers play bards? by the numbers
posted here, less than 5%. by your argument, then bards and their issues are
insignificant because less than 5% of the people who play everquest are affected.

it's only insignificant if you're not the one it's affecting.



At 10:13 AM 2/26/01 -0700, you wrote:
>Only for less than 5% of the people, hence its insignificance.
>
> >and you can't really discount pvp, it is a part of the game.
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
>Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
